testcase.name: User should be able to add products to the created list and remove it
testcase.system-out: Given go to Amazon url......................................................passed Then navigate to sign in page...............................................passed Then enter valid email address to the email box.............................passed And click continue button...................................................passed Then enter valid password to the password box...............................passed And click sign in button....................................................passed Then enter "honey" into search box..........................................passed And click the search button.................................................passed Then select first product and add it to "Grocery List"......................passed Then verify the "first product" in "Grocery List"...........................passed Then select "Grocery List" from Account & Lists menu........................passed Then click Remove button for added product..................................passed Then verify the "first product" removed from "Grocery List".................passed
